评论详情: I was so excited to order these shoes, and they didn’t disappoint! They’re so gorgeous, and the rose in the heel of the shoe is such an elegant and creative touch. I was super surprised to get these for their price of just $25, because the quality is excellent, and they aren’t uncomfortable to walk in (although I wear heels a lot, so maybe I’m just used to them lol). A must have for your wardrobe, especially if you have a darker sense of style like I do. Very pleased!
I get tons of compliments when I wear these shoes!  Unique and beautiful
My grand daughter loves them. Creative and expresses the individuality of decor.

Don’t buy the rose ones. It’s just a red blob on the bottom basically and it’s not comfortable. It’s not like the picture at alll! No grip, slides when you walk, too big, uncomfortable material, no padding and a total scam.

Bought these for my daughter’s senior prom. 1. Color showed black but these are burgundy 2. She didn’t make it in the shoes more than an hour before she called me to tell me the toe of the shoe came apart. So don’t waste money buying these

The shoes are pretty close to the images but there is afew differences like the monster eye doesn't really look like they do in the images, the eyes being these little beads that's just been glued on and one of them came off from the one of the shoes where it was hot glued onto the circular piece of pompom that can be taken off the shoe. Los zapatos son muy bonitos, aunque por el precio está claro que no son de piel, aún así son muy originales y por eso los compré. La talla es pequeña, yo normalmente calzo un 36 o 37 (dependiendo del tamaño) y he pedido el 37 y me queda algo justo, aunque ese no ha sido el problema. El problema ha sido que ha venido la cinta tobillera de uno de ellos con el enganche defectuoso y por lo tanto se suelta solo. He pedido la devolución y al ir a correos me he encontrado con que tengo que pagar los gatos de envío. Estoy a la espera de que me responda el vendedor y espero que sepa responder satisfactoriamente a mi devolución del producto y al pago de los portes.

Bought for my daughter for school in adult size 4. Shies are lovely but as soon as you walk the velcro comes unstuck. I screenshot the shoe and you can clearly see a buckle pin going through the hole but none on our shoe. Makes them pretty much unwearable.

Honestly so disappointed. Bought these shoes because I loved the style. Put the first one on and it was fine. Fit perfectly, was comfortable. The second one, though, had a staple sticking out inside the sole, which would press against the big toe when you wore it.  They were amazing apart from that but I'm pretty upset that such a small issue has to make me return the shoes.  Returning is pretty simple, though, which I'm thankful for.
